words.name: abandon
words.eg: Snow forced many drivers to abandon their vehicles.

words.name: fiber
words.eg: Silk is the strongest natural fiber in the world.

words.name: achieve
words.eg: Hard work can help you achieve your goals.

words.name: balance
words.eg: Maintaining a work-life balance is important for well-being.

words.name: compose
words.eg: The musician composed a beautiful symphony.

words.name: decrease
words.eg: The number of visitors decreased due to the bad weather.

words.name: enhance
words.eg: Eating healthy foods can enhance your immune system.

words.name: formulate
words.eg: The scientist formulated a new hypothesis.

words.name: generate
words.eg: The wind turbines generate electricity for the town.

words.name: illustrate
words.eg: He used diagrams to illustrate his point.

words.name: justify
words.eg: The company had to justify their decision to the shareholders.

words.name: modify
words.eg: The software was modified to fix the bug.
